DanMartin.label: Dan Martin
DanMartin.about: Dan Martin: “Tibetan Vocabulary.”, April 2003|This is meant to be a word-index more than a dictionary, and technical, idiosyncratic, and obsolete usages and meanings are given priority over more common ones which may readily be found in the available dictionaries.  To some degree, the content reflects my own research focus on 11th and 12th century texts.|Source: Rangjung Yeshe Tibetan-English Dharma Dictionary 3.0 (2003)|online version: http://rywiki.tsadra.org
